# [BlueskySocial](https://bsky.app)

BlueskySocial Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: BlueskySocial
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: bsky.app
- Responsive response: YES
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
